text: Sally Cecilia Hawkins (born 27 April 1976) is an English actress. She played Ginger in Blue Jasmine (2013). She plays Mary Brown in the movie Paddington (2014) and Paddington 2 (2017) and Elisa Esposito in The Shape of Water (2017). Hawkins was born in Dulwich, south London. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Satellite Award winners Category:Actors from London Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:1976 births Category:Living people
title: Sally Hawkins
